TextView.android:text: This app generates the best workout based on your current workout experience and time constraints. Note that the app is going to add more specialized workout plans in the future. In order to have a successful experience with the app train with INTENSITY and increase your volume for every exercise in every workout. Note that volume is the number of reps multiplied byt he number of sets. Once you reach a certain volume increase the weight hit the same volume and increase the weight again. DO NOT HIT THE SAME SETS AND REPS EVERY SINGLE WORKOUT.
